patthana16.51:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.51:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.51:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
